description: Flickr - almost certainly the best online photo management and sharing application in the world.
steps: After creation app, you will receive apiKey and apiSecret
For getting oauthToken and oauthSecret use getRequestToken endpoint
After that,you need to get permission to use your application
After authorization ,use getAccessToken for getting accessToken and accessSecret

args.info: The NSID of the user who's photo to search. If this parameter isn't passed then everybody's public photos will be searched. A value of `me` will search against the calling user's photos for authenticated calls.

args.name: tags
args.info: Photos with one or more of the tags listed will be returned.

args.name: tagMode
args.info: Either 'any' for an OR combination of tags, or 'all' for an AND combination. Defaults to 'any' if not specified.

args.name: text
args.info: A free text search. Photos who's title, description or tags contain the text will be returned. You can exclude results that match a term by prepending it with a - character.

args.name: minUploadDate
args.info: Minimum upload date. Photos with an upload date greater than or equal to this value will be returned.

args.name: maxUploadDate
args.info: Maximum upload date. Photos with an upload date less than or equal to this value will be returned.

args.name: minTakenDate
args.info: Minimum taken date. Photos with an taken date greater than or equal to this value will be returned.

args.name: maxTakenDate
args.info: Maximum taken date. Photos with an taken date less than or equal to this value will be returned.

args.name: license
args.info: The license id for photos (for possible values see the flickr.photos.licenses.getInfo method). Multiple licenses may be comma-separated.

args.name: sort
args.info: The order in which to sort returned photos. Deafults to date-posted-desc (unless you are doing a radial geo query, in which case the default sorting is by ascending distance from the point specified).

args.name: privacyFilter
args.info: Return photos only matching a certain privacy level.

args.name: bbox

structure.name: values
structure.info: defining the Bounding Box of the area that will be searched.

args.info: The 4 values represent the bottom-left corner of the box and the top-right corner, minimum_longitude, minimum_latitude, maximum_longitude, maximum_latitude.See more in readme.

args.name: accuracy
args.info: Recorded accuracy level of the location information. Current range is 1-16.See more in readme.

args.name: safeSearch
args.info: Safe search setting.See more in readme.

args.name: contentType
args.info: Content Type.See more in readme.

args.name: machineTags
args.info: Aside from passing in a fully formed machine tag.See more in readme.

args.name: machineTagMode
args.info: Either 'any' for an OR combination of tags, or 'all' for an AND combination. Defaults to 'any' if not specified.

args.name: groupId
args.info: The id of a group who's pool to search. If specified, only matching photos posted to the group's pool will be returned.

args.name: contacts
args.info: Search your contacts. Either 'all' or 'ff' for just friends and family. (Experimental)

args.name: woeId
args.info: A 32-bit identifier that uniquely represents spatial entities.See more in readme.

args.name: placeId
args.info: A Flickr place id. (not used if bbox argument is present).See more in readme.

args.name: media
args.info: Filter results by media type.All (default).

args.name: hasGeo
args.info: Any photo that has been geotagged, or if the value is `0` any photo that has not been geotagged.See more in readme.

args.name: geoContext
args.info: Geo context is a numeric value representing the photo's geotagginess beyond latitude and longitude. For example, you may wish to search for photos that were taken `indoors` or `outdoors`.

args.name: coordinates
args.info: A valid longitude and latitude in decimal format, for doing radial geo queries.

args.name: radiusUnits
args.info: The unit of measure when doing radial geo queries. Valid options are `mi` (miles) and `km` (kilometers). The default is `km`.

args.name: isCommons
args.info: Limit the scope of the search to only photos that are part of the Flickr Commons project. Default is false.

args.name: inGallery
args.info: Limit the scope of the search to only photos that are in a gallery? Default is false, search all photos.

args.name: isGetty
args.info: Limit the scope of the search to only photos that are for sale on Getty. Default is false.

args.name: radius
args.info: A valid radius used for geo queries, greater than zero and less than 20 miles (or 32 kilometers), for use with point-based geo queries. The default value is 5 (km).

args.name: extras
args.info: List of extra information to fetch for each returned record.

args.name: perPage
args.info: Number of items to return per page. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 100. The maximum allowed value is 500.

args.name: page
args.info: The page of results to return. If this argument is omitted, it defaults to 1.
